name: Hexi
description: Hexi is a 2D game where you try to dodge hexagons coming your way! Try to beat your friend's high score and prove you are a skilled gamer. This game is my first one to publish so if you find any bugs please do not go ham on me as this is my first game and I am still developing it and fixing bugs and errors also yes I took inspiration form Brackeys 10 minute video, "Hope you don't mind 😊". Soon will be implemented a score based shrink speed and spawn rate so when you reach a certain amount of score the shrink speed and spawn rate of the hexagons increases.
